title: Decide for the future of Goatcoin.
body:
We believe transparency with the community is the best solution for regaining our power again.
As you know Goatcoin has been facing into many problems and issues due to many reasons but mainly because of its developers. Some of our devs got back to their job IRL after Covid19 reopening so they can't code for us anymore.
We have some solutions to choose.
Kindly please decide for the future of this project carefully.

1.  We can make this token  a fun, meme, community based token, we keep our NFT marketplace alive and  our company will buy back GOAT and add it to Pancakeswap liquidity with BNB frequently by the income that coming from our new upcoming blockchain projects and games.

2. Hiring more devs to work on Gotcha.gg NFT marketplace and the other stuff of the roadmap

we don't vote with any of our addresses to keep this voting fair and community based.

Highly recommended to participate in this voting.
choices: Hiring more devs to update more
author: 0xd33bFC66B39189E3452C6E65e56572a6228dd61b
